function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 in the construction industry due to lack of guidelines and best practices.","Impact":"Risk of increased COVID-19 cases and potential shutdown of construction projects.","Mitigation":"Training and implementation of strict guidelines for construction sites, including social distancing, mask-wearing, and regular testing.","Technologies":"Use of contactless technology for project management and communication.","People":"Construction workers, contractors, and project managers.","Owner":"Government agencies, construction companies, and project managers."},{"Description":"Lack of research on the consequences of COVID-19 on the US construction industry.","Impact":"Uncertainty about the long-term effects of the pandemic on construction projects and businesses.","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive research studies to understand the impact, and developing contingency plans to mitigate adverse effects.","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling to assess the potential consequences and develop risk management strategies.","People":"Construction industry researchers, government agencies, and project stakeholders.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and construction industry associations."},{"Description":"Absence of exploration of new construction-related research areas or streams due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Missed opportunities for innovation and adaptation in response to the pandemic's impact on the construction industry.","Mitigation":"Encouraging and funding research initiatives to explore emerging trends and new areas of focus in construction in response to COVID-19.","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms for remote research and virtual conferences for knowledge sharing.","People":"Construction researchers, academic institutions, and industry associations.","Owner":"Funding agencies, industry associations, and academic institutions."}]}
